Name: Scan
Des: Scans the surroundings and warns when there's a rat faction player.

Name: Pointer
Des: Picks a rat faction player who's not in the stealth status and generates a pointer to point at where the player is for a period of time.

Name: Animal Trap
Des: Generates an animal trap under the character's feet. The trap will stun any rat faction player passing by and notify the player who placed it. Each player can place up to 3 Animal Traps at the same time.

Name: Mass Speedup
Des: Makes all rat faction players move faster for a period of time.

Name: Random Item
Des: Upon casting the skill, the player will get a random rat faction exclusive item.

Name: Teleport Hat
Des: Upon casting the skill for the first time, generates a temporary magic hat underfoot. Casting the skill again when there's a magic hat will teleport the caster to where the hat is.
